Speaker: final draft
Dialogue: June 3, 2008

Speaker: gang boss
Dialogue: Maybe you should chew on my FIST!!

Speaker: warrior
Dialogue: Enough talk. Let's FIGHT! SHASHABOOEY!

Speaker: ninja cat
Dialogue: MY EYES!

Speaker: gator
Dialogue: HE'S TOO AWESOME!

Speaker: smitten bunny
Dialogue: And ATTRACTIVE!

Speaker: grateful bunny
Dialogue: How can we repay you??

Speaker: warrior
Dialogue: There is no charge for awesomeness, or attractiveness.

Speaker: warrior
Dialogue: KABLOOEY!
NARRATOR  Even the most heroic heroes in all of China, the Furious Five, bowed in respect to this great master.

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: We should hang out.

Speaker: warrior
Dialogue: Agreed.

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: Po! Get up!

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: You'll be late for work!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Whu?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Uh, nothing!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Coming!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Sorry, Dad.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Sorry doesn't make the noodles.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh, nothing. Just had a crazy dream.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: About what?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Huh?

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: The dream. What were you dreaming about?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: What was I... eh, I was dreaming about uh... heh...

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Noodles. You were really dreaming about noodles?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Uh, yeah. What else would I be dreaming about?

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Oh, happy day! My son, finally having the noodle dream!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Uh...a sign of what?

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: You are almost ready to be entrusted with the secret ingredient of my "Secret Ingredient Soup." And then you will fulfill your destiny and take over the restaurant, just as I took it over from my father, who took it over from his father, who won it from a friend in a game of mahjong.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Dad Dad Dad, it was just a dream.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: No, it was the dream. We are noodle folk. Broth runs through our veins.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: But Dad, didn't you ever, I dunno, want to do something else? Something besides noodles?

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Actually...

Speaker: po
Dialogue: So why didn't you?!

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Oh, because it was a stupid dream. Can you imagine, me making tofu?  No. We all have our place in this world. Mine is here. And yours is--

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I know. Is here.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: No, it's at tables two, five, seven, and twelve.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Well done, students... if you were trying to disappoint me.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Master Shifu!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: What?!

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Aah! It's Master Oogway. He wants to see you.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Master Oogway? You summoned me.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Why must something be wrong for me to want to see my old friend?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: So... nothing's wrong?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Well, I didn't say that.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You were saying?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: I have had a vision... Tai Lung will return.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: That is impossible. He is in prison.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Nothing is impossible.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Zeng!

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Yes, Master Shifu.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: We have to do something. We can't just let him march on the valley, and take his revenge! He'll, he'll--

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Your mind is like this water, my friend. When it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: The Dragon Scroll...

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: It is time.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: But who? Who is worthy to be trusted with the secret to limitless power? To become...the Dragon Warrior?!

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: I don't know.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oop...sorry.

Speaker: angry patron
Dialogue: Hey! Watch it, Po!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Sorry. Suck it up.

Speaker: disgusted patron
Dialogue: Ugh!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oop! Sorry! A thousand pardons.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Po! Where are you going?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: To the...Jade Palace?

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: But you're forgetting your noodle cart! The whole valley will be there, and you'll sell noodles to all of them.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Selling noodles? But Dad, you know, I was kinda thinking maybe I...

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Yeah?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I was kinda thinking maybe I...

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Uh huh?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: ...Could also sell the bean buns. They are about to go bad.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: That's my boy! I told you that dream was a sign!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Yeah, ha ha, glad I had it.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Come on! Come on, ya-- Almost there...

Speaker: kg shaw
Dialogue: Sorry, Po.

Speaker: jr shaw
Dialogue: We'll bring you back a souvenir.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: No. I'll bring me back a souvenir.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: It is an historic day, isn't it, Master Oogway?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Yes, and one I feared I would not live to see. Are your students ready?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Yes, Master Oogway.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Now know this, old friend. Whomever I choose will not only bring peace to the Valley, but also to you.

Speaker: announcer
Dialogue: Let the tournament begin!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Yeah!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Citizens of the Valley of Peace! It is my great honor to present to you... Tigress! Viper! Crane! Monkey! Mantis! The Furious Five!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: The Furious Five!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Warriors prepare!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Peeky-hole!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Ready for battle!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Yeah! Woo! The Thousand Tongues of Fire!

Speaker: pig fan
Dialogue: Whoa! Look at that.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Hey, get out of the way!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: And finally...Master Tigress!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I KNOW!!

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: I sense the Dragon Warrior is among us.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Citizens of the Valley of Peace! Master Oogway will now choose... the Dragon Warrior!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Huh? Oh no! Wait!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: What does it look like I'm doing? Stop! Stop! I'm going to see the Dragon Warrior!

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: But I don't understand. You finally had the noodle dream.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I lied. I don't dream about noodles, Dad!

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Come on, son. Let's get back to work.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Okay.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Oh! Come back!

Speaker: crowd
Dialogue: Oooh! Aaahh!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Uh oh...

Speaker: po
Dialogue: What's going on? Where...uh? What are you pointing--?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: How interesting.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Master, are you pointing at...me?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Him.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Who--?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: You.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Me?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: The universe has brought us the Dragon Warrior!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: furious five
Dialogue: What??

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: What???

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: WHAT????

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Stop! Wait! Who told you to--?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: There are no accidents.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Forgive us, Master. We have failed you.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: No. If the panda has not quit by morning, then I will have failed you.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Wait wait wait! I bring a message from Master Shifu.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: What?!?!  "Double the guard?! Extra precautions?! Your prison may not be adequate!"

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Absolutely not.  Shifu does. I'm just the messenger.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: I'll give you a message for your Master Shifu.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Escape from Chogun Prison is impossible!

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Whoa.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Impressive, isn't it?

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Yes, very impressive. It's VERY impressive.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: One way in, one way out, one thousand guards, and one prisoner.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Yes, except that prisoner is Tai Lung...

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Take us down.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: What are you doing?!

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Behold, Tai Lung.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: I'll um...I'm just gonna wait right here.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: It's nothing to worry about. It's perfectly safe.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Oof!

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Crossbows! At the ready!

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Crossbows?!

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Hey, tough guy, did you hear? Oogway's finally gonna give someone the Dragon Scroll and it's not gonna be you!

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: What are you doing?! Don't get him mad.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: What's he gonna do about it? I've got him completely immobilized.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: I'm good. I've seen enough. I'm gonna tell Shifu he's got nothing to worry about.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: No, he doesn't.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Okay, I'll tell him that. Can we please go now?

Speaker: crowd
Dialogue: Dragon Warrior! Dragon Warrior!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Wait a second! Hello? Uh...I think there's been a slight mistake. Everyone seems to think that I'm, uh...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Have you finished sight-seeing?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Sorry. I should've come to see you first.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: My patience is wearing thin.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh. Well, I mean, it's not like you were going anywhere.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Would you turn around?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Sure.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: So you're the legendary Dragon Warrior. Hmmm?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Uh...I guess so?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Wrong! You are not the Dragon Warrior. You will never be the Dragon Warrior until you have learned the secret of the Dragon Scroll.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: So how does this work? You have a ladder or trampoline or...?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You think it's that easy? That I am just going to hand you the secret to limitless power?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: No, I...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: One must first master the highest level of kung fu. And that is clearly impossible if that one is someone like you.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Someone like me?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Yes. Look at you...this fat butt.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Those are sensitive in the flabby parts.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: And this ridiculous belly.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Hey...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: --and utter disregard for personal hygiene.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Now wait a minute. That's a little uncalled-for.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Don't stand that close...I can smell your breath.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Listen...Oogway said that I was the-

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Oh, you know this hold?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: DevelopedbyMasterWuxiInTheThirdDyna sty-- YES.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Oh, then you must know what happens when I flex my pinky.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: No no no!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You know the hardest part of this? The hardest part is cleaning up afterwards...

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Okay! Okay! Take it easy...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Now listen closely, panda. Oogway may have picked you, but when I'm through with you, I promise you, you're going to wish he hadn't. Are we clear?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Yeah, we're clear. We're clear. We are so clear.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Good. I can't wait to get started.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Let's begin.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Wait wait wait...What? Now?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Yes...now. Unless you think the great Oogway was wrong, and you are not the Dragon Warrior.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh, okay. Well-- I don't know if I can do all of those moves.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Well, if we don't try, we'll never know will we?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Uh, yeah. It's just, maybe we can find something more suited to my level.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: And what level is that?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Well, ya know...I'm not a master, but uh, let's just start at zero, level zero.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: There is no such thing as level zero.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Hey! Maybe I can start with that.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: That? We use that for training children. And for propping the door open when it's hot. But if you insist...

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Whoa. The Furious Five. You're so much bigger than your action figures -- except for you, Mantis. You're about the same.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Go ahead, panda. Show us what you can do.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Um, are they gonna watch? Or should I just wait until they get back to work or something...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Hit it.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Ok. I mean, I just ate. So I'm still digesting... So my kung fu might not be as good as later on.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Just hit it.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Alright. Whatcha got? You got nothing cause I got it right here. You picking on my friends? Get ready to feel the thunder. I'm comin' at him with the crazy feet. Whatcha gonna do about my crazy feet? I'm a blur. I'm a blur. You never seen bear style, you only seen praying Mantis! OR... I could come at you Monkey style. OR... I'm comin' at ya snikity-snake.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Would you hit it!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Alright...alright.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Why don't you try again?   A little harder...

Speaker: po
Dialogue: How's tha--

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: This'll be easier than I thought.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Feeling a little nauseous.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: There is now a level zero.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: There's no words.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: No denying that.

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: I don't understand what Master Oogway was thinking. The poor guy's just gonna get himself killed.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: He is so mighty! The Dragon Warrior fell out of the sky on a ball of fire.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: When he walks, the very ground shakes!

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: One would think that Master Oogway would choose someone who actually knew Kung Fu.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Yeah, or could at least touch his toes.

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: Or even see his toes.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Okay.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Am now.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I was just uh... Some day huh? That kung fu stuff is hard work, right? Your biceps sore?

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Um...I've had a long and rather disappointing day, so uh...yeah, I should probably get to sleep now.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Yeah yeah yeah, of course.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Okay, thanks.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: It's just...I'm such a big fan.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Oop.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: You guys were totally amazing at the Battle of Weeping River. Outnumbered a thousand to one, but you didn't stop, and then you just... HI-YAH!

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Look, you don't belong here.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I know. I know. You're right. I just - my whole life I've dreamed of-

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: No no no... I meant you don't belong here. I mean, in this room. This is my room. Property of Crane.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh, okay. Right right. Yeah, you want to get to sleep.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I'm keepin' you up. We got big things tomorrow. Alright. You're awesome. Last thing I'm gonna say. Okay. Bye bye.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: I didn't say anything.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Okay. Alright. Goodnight. Sleep well.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: You don't belong here.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Uh, yeah, yeah. Of course. This is your room.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: I mean...you don't belong in the Jade Palace. You're a disgrace to Kung Fu, and if you have any respect for who we are and what we do, you will be gone by morning.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Big fan...

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: I see you have found the Sacred Peach Tree of Heavenly Wisdom.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Is that what this is? I am so sorry. I thought it was just a regular peach tree.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: I understand. You eat when you are upset.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Upset? I'm not upset. What makes you think I'm upset?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: So why are you upset?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I probably sucked more today than anyone in the history of kung fu, in the history of China, in the history of sucking.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Probably.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: And the Five... man, you should have seen them, they totally hate me.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Totally.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: How's Shifu ever going to turn me into the Dragon Warrior? I mean, I'm not like The Five. I've got no claws, no wings, no venom. Even Mantis has those...  ...thingies. Maybe I should just quit and go back to making noodles.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Quit, don't quit. Noodles, don't noodles.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: What's happening?!

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Fire Crossbows!

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Tai Lung is free! I must warn Shifu!

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: You're not going anywhere. And neither is he.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Let go of me!

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Bring it up!

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: He's coming this way!

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: He won't get far.  Archers!

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: We're dead. So very, very dead.

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Heh heh...not yet we're not! Now!

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Can we run now?

Speaker: commander
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Nuuu... Urggg...

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: I'm glad Shifu sent you. I was beginning to think I had been forgotten.

Speaker: furious five
Dialogue: Good morning master!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Panda! Panda, wake up!

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: What do we do now, Master? With the panda gone, who will be the Dragon Warrior?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: All we can do is resume our training and trust that in time, the true Dragon Warrior will be revealed.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: What are you doing here?!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Hey! Huh... Good morning, Master! I thought I'd warm up a little.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You're stuck.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Stuck?! Whaa? Pfft... stuck... Yeah, I'm stuck.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Help him.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Oh dear.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Maybe on three. One. Two-

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Don't mention it.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: No really, I appreci--

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: --EVER.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You actually thought you could learn to do a full split in one night? It takes years to develop one's flexibility and years longer to apply it in combat.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Yeah, excellent!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Let's get started.

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: Are you ready?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I was born ready--

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: I'm sorry, brother! I thought you said you were ready!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: That was awesome! Let's go again.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I've been taking it easy on you, panda, but no more! Your next opponent... will be me.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Alright! Let's go!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Step forth.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh, yeah!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: To take his strength and use it against him.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: But a real warrior never quits. Don't worry, Master, I will never quit!

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: If he's smart, he won't come back up those steps.

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: But he will.

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: He's not gonna quit, is he?

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: He's not gonna quit bouncin', I'll tell ya that.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: Trust me, it will. It's just not easy finding the right nerve points under all this--

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Fat?

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: Fur, I was gonna say fur.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Sure you were.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: Who am I to judge a warrior based on his size? I mean -- look at me.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Ow!

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: Maybe you should take a look at this again.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: Oh! Okay.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Ow! Don't...  Stop it, stop-- Yow! I know Master Shifu's trying to inspire me and all, but if I didn't know any better, I'd say he was trying to get rid of me.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: I know he can seem kind of heartless--

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: According to legend, there was once a time when Master Shifu actually used to smile.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: But that was before...

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Before what?

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Before Tai Lung.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Uh yeah, we're not really supposed to talk about him.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Well, if he's going to stay here, he should know.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Guys, guys. I know about Tai Lung.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: He wasn't just a student.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: And now he has a chance to make things right, to train the true Dragon Warrior. And he's stuck with you: a big, fat panda who treats it like a joke.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Doieeeee...

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Oh! That is it!

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: Wait! My fault! I accidentally tweaked his facial nerve.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Inner peace. Inner peace. Inner peace.

Speaker: zeng
Dialogue: Uh...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Master! Master!

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Hmmm?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I have-- it's-- it's very bad news.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Ah, Shifu. There is just news. There is no good or bad.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Master, your vision...your vision was right. Tai Lung has broken out of prison. He's on his way!

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: That is bad news...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: The panda? Master, that panda is not the Dragon Warrior.
SHIFU  He wasn't even meant to be here -- it was an accident!

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: There are no accidents.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Yes, I know. You've said that already. Twice.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Well, that was no accident either.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Thrice.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: My old friend, the panda will never fulfill his destiny, nor you yours, until you let go of the illusion of control.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Illusion?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Yeah. Look at this tree, Shifu. I cannot make it blossom when it suits me, nor make it bear fruit before its time.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: But there are things we can control.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Ah, yes. But no matter what you do, that seed will grow to be a peach tree. You may wish for an apple, or an orange... but you will get a peach.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: But a peach cannot defeat Tai Lung!

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Maybe it can. If you are willing to guide it, to nurture it. To believe in it.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: But how? How? I need your help, Master.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: No, you just need to believe. Promise me, Shifu. Promise me you will believe.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I... I will try.

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: Good. My time has come. You must continue your journey without me.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: What... what are you..?

Speaker: oogway
Dialogue: You must believe.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Master!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: ...but you're a lousy tipper.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Really? So... how'd you get out of there alive?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I mean, I didn't actually say that, but I thought it... in my mind.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: This is really good.
PO  You should try my dad's secret ingredient soup. He actually knows the secret ingredient.

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: What are you talking about? This is amazing.

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: Wow, you're a really good cook.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: I wish my mouth was bigger.

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: Tigress, you gotta try this.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: It is said that the Dragon Warrior can survive for months at a time on nothing but the dew of a single gingko leaf and the energy of the universe.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I guess my body doesn't know it's the Dragon Warrior yet. I'm gonna need a lot more than dew. And, uh, universe juice.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: Oh, nothing... Master Shifu!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: You will never be the Dragon Warrior, unless you lose five hundred pounds and brush your teeth!

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: It's Shifu.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Of course it's Shifu. What do you think I'm doing?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You think this is funny? Tai Lung has escaped from prison and you're acting like children!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: He is coming for the Dragon Scroll, and you are the only one who can stop him.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: And here I am saying you got no sense of humor. I'm gonna stop Tai...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Oogway cannot, not anymore.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: The panda?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Yes, the panda!

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Master, please. Let us stop Tai Lung. This is what you've trained us for.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: No! It is not your destiny to defeat Tai Lung. It is his.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You cannot leave! A real warrior never quits!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Watch me!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You will beat him because you are the Dragon Warrior!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Ow! You don't believe that! You never believed that! From the first moment I got here, you've been trying to get rid of me.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Yes. I was. But now I ask you to trust in your master as I have come to trust in mine.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: You're not my master. And I'm not the Dragon Warrior.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Then why didn't you quit? You knew I was trying to get rid of you, and yet you stayed.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Yeah, I stayed. I stayed because every time you threw a brick at my head or said I smelled, it hurt. But it could never hurt more than it did every day of my life just being me.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: But I can change you! I can turn you into the Dragon Warrior! And I will!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: C'mon, Tai Lung is on his way here right now. And even if it takes him a hundred years to get here, how are you gonna change this...  ...into the Dragon Warrior? How? How? How?!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I don't know!!!  I don't know.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: That's what I thought.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: This is what you trained me for.

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: Tigress!

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Don't try and stop me!

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: We're not trying to stop you!

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: We're coming with you!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: What? I eat when I'm upset, okay?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Oh, no need to explain. I just thought you might be Monkey -- he hides his almond cookies on the top shelf.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Don't tell Monkey.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Look at you.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Yeah, I know. I disgust you.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: No no, I mean... how did you get up there?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I don't know. I guess I-- I don't know. I was getting a cookie...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: And yet you are ten feet off the ground and have done a perfect split.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: No, this... this is just an accident.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: There are no accidents. Come with me.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I know you're trying to be all mystical and kung fu-y, but could you at least tell me where we're going?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: You dragged me all the way out here for a bath?!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Panda, we do not wash our pits in The Pool of Sacred Tears.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: The pool of...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: This is where Oogway unravelled the mysteries of harmony and focus. This is the birthplace of Kung Fu.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Yeah...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Then I am your master!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Okay!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Don't cry.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Okay.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: When you focus on Kung Fu, when you concentrate...you stink.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh great, `cause I'm hungry.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Good. When you have been trained, you may eat. Let us begin.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: After you, panda.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Just like that? No situps? No ten mile hike?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I vowed to train you... and you have been trained. You are free to eat.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Hey!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I said you are free to eat. Have a dumpling.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Hey!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You are free to eat!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Am I?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Are you?!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I'm not hungry... master.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Cut it!

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: Where's the Dragon Warrior?

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: How do you know you're not looking at her?

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: You think I'm a fool? I know you're not the Dragon Warrior. None of you!

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: Po?

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: So that is his name -- Po. Finally, a worthy opponent. Our battle will be legendary!

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: We've got this. Help her!

Speaker: viper
Dialogue: Monkey!

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: Go!  Ack! What was I thinking?!

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Mantis!

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: Shifu taught you well...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You have done well, Panda.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Done well? Done well?! I've done awesome!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: The mark of a true hero is humility!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Huh? Guys? Guys!

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: We were no match for his nerve attack.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: He has gotten stronger.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Who? Tai Lung? Stronger?

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: He's too fast!

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: I thought we could stop him.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: He could have killed you.

Speaker: mantis
Dialogue: Why didn't he?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: So you could come back here and strike fear into our hearts. But it won't work!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Uh, it might, I mean, a little. I'm pretty scared.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You can defeat him, panda.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Are you kidding? If they can't-- They're five masters. I'm just one me.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: But you will have the one thing that no one else does.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: You really believe I'm ready?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You are, Po.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Wait, what happens when I read it?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: No one knows, but legend says you will be able to hear a butterfly's wing-beat.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Whoa! Really? That's cool.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Yes. And see light in the deepest cave. You will feel the universe in motion around you.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Wow! Can I punch through walls? Can I do a quadruple back flip? Will I have invisibility--

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Focus. Focus.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Huh? Oh, yeah... yeah.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Read it, Po, and fulfill your destiny. Read it and become... the Dragon Warrior!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Whooaa!!!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Here! Look!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: No! I am forbidden to look upon--

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Okay. So like, Oogway was just a crazy old turtle after all?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: No. Oogway was wiser than us all.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh, come on! Face it. He picked me by accident. Of course I'm not the Dragon Warrior. Who am I kidding?

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: But who will stop Tai Lung?

Speaker: crane
Dialogue: He'll destroy everything...and everyone.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: No, evacuate the Valley. You must protect the villagers from Tai Lung's rage.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: What about you master?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I will fight him.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I can hold him off long enough for everyone to escape.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: But Shifu, he'll kill you.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Then I will finally have paid for my mistake.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: We've got to get them out safely.

Speaker: monkey
Dialogue: Come, little one. Let's find your mama.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Viper, gather the southern farmers. Mantis, the north. Crane, light the way.

Speaker: jr shaw
Dialogue: Look, it's the Dragon Warrior.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Hey, Dad.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Po!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Good to be back.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Let's go Po. So, for our next shop, it's time to face it -- the future of noodles is dice-cut vegetables, no longer slices.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I don't know, Dad. Honestly, sometimes I can't believe I'm actually your son.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Po, I think it's time I told you something I should have told you a long time ago...

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Okay.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: The secret ingredient of my secret ingredient soup!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: C'mere! The secret ingredient is... nothing!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Huh?

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: You heard me. Nothing. There is no secret ingredient!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Wait wait...it's just plain old noodle soup? You don't add some kind of special sauce or something?

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: Don't have to. To make something special, you just have to believe it's special.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: There is no secret ingredient...

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: I have come home, Master.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: This is no longer your home. And I am no longer your master.

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: Yes. You have a new favorite. So where is this...Po? Did I scare him off?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: This battle is between you and me.

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: So. That is how it's going to be?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: That is how it must be.

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: I rotted in jail for twenty years because of your weakness!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Obeying your master is not weakness!

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: You knew I was the Dragon Warrior! You always knew...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You were not meant to be the Dragon Warrior! That was not my fault!

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: NOT YOUR FAULT?!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: It was never my decision to make!

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: It is now.

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I would rather die.

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: All I ever did, I did to make you proud! Tell me how proud you are, Shifu! Tell me! TELL ME!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I have always been proud of you. From the first moment, I've been proud of you. And it was my pride that blinded me. I loved you too much to see what you were becoming. What I was turning you into. I'm... sorry.

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: I don't want your apology. I want my scroll!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Dragon Warrior has taken scroll halfway across China by now. You will never see that scroll, Tai Lung. Never. Never...

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: Who are you?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Buddy, I am the Dragon Warrior.  Huhhh...

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: You?! Him?!  You're a panda. What are you gonna do, big guy? Sit on me?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Don't tempt me. Haha. No. I'm gonna use this. You want it? Come and get it.

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: Finally!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Lightning!

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: The scroll has given him power.  NOOO0!!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: It's okay. I didn't get it the first time either.

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: po
Dialogue: There is no secret ingredient. It's just you.

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: RRRAAAH!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: AAAAGGGHH!

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: You... can't defeat me. You're just a big, fat panda!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: I'm not a big, fat panda. I'm the big, fat panda.

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: The Wuxi Finger Hold!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh, you know this hold?

Speaker: tai lung
Dialogue: You're bluffing. You're bluffing! Shifu didn't teach you that.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Nope. I figured it out.

Speaker: kg shaw
Dialogue: Look! The Dragon Warrior.

Speaker: po's dad
Dialogue: That's my boy. That big, lovely kung fu warrior is my son!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Thanks, Dad.

Speaker: tigress
Dialogue: Master.

Speaker: furious five
Dialogue: Master.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Master Shifu!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Master! Shifu! Shifu! Are you okay?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Po! You're alive!  Or we're both dead.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: No, Master, I didn't die. I defeated Tai Lung!

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: You did?!

Speaker: po
Dialogue: No! Master! No No No! Don't die, Shifu. Please...

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: I'm not dying, you idiot-- ah, Dragon Warrior. I'm simply at peace. Finally.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Oh. So, um, I should...stop talking?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: If you can.

Speaker: po
Dialogue: Want to get something to eat?

Speaker: shifu
Dialogue: Yeah.
